phrases: It is the latest issue of Youkai's newspaper!
The latest issue just came out not long ago.
The latest issue gives a good feeling.
Yeah, this is all thanks to everyone is effort.
Yay, all the newspaper are distributed!
The news report critics are good this time too.
Hey, how about we hold a celebration?
Like bring some snacks and such.
That is a great idea, Moka-san.
He was over here just now...
He must have gone to harass some female students, right?
Actually, the newspaper club is recruiting some beautiful girls for modeling, want to try it?
So it is okay if we do not invite him.
He is an enemy of women!
Other than that, how are we going to hold celebration?
First, let us go to the store and buy snacks.
I want to drink some beverages.
Well then, we will bring our stuffs to the clubroom after class is over.
And let us play Bingo after that.
You guys sure get along well.
Getting close with one another...I do not really understand that.
What is that suppose to mean?
It is a bit tattered, but if you do not mind...
You are cuter than I thought.
Who was that just now, Tsukune?
Ah, someone I do not know...
But she kind of pisses me off.
Putting that aside, let us party hard after school.
Well then, let me introduce her to the class again.
Due to some reasons she has not been coming to school,
So everyone, please get along with her.
Then, let us meet up in the clubroom after we finish buying everything.
You better be looking forward to my handmade sweets.
Kurumu-chan, you are too close to Tsukune!
Anything I can do for you?
I read it; the news that you wrote is interesting as usual.
When I was away from school, I always requested Nekonome-sensei to send me copies of Youkai's newspaper.
I have been gathering your articles into this scrapbook.
Oh I see, I am happy...
I even wrote some comments about them.
There is some strange and small words written in here!
I love the news reports that you write.
You always write from a weak person's view, which I can relate to.
Your personality and way of thinking is just like mine.
I also know how it feels...
There is a student in your class that is been refusing to come to school.
If I remember correctly, she is called Shirayuki.
It seems like she started to attend school today.
Refusing to come to school from the new term would basically mean that she has some major problems.
According to reports, due to her personality,
This has been a recurring problem since junior high.
I would like you to watch her and not let the other students get any bad influences from her, Nekonome-sensei.
The stone just skipped nine times.
I have to return to the clubroom soon.
Your throwing is too bad that you still cannot make it skip more than 4 times, right?
It is already time for the party, and Moka-san is waiting for me.
Do you want to go back to that collusive club of yours?
No, rather, you just want to see Akashiya Moke, right?
If you were to go, I do not know what I will do to that woman.
All you need to do is just be mine, Tsukune.
Tsukune will not be coming no matter how much longer you wait.
If you do not exist, Tsukune will be mine.
They are as cold as ice.
Unfortunately, the me here is just an ice doll.
All in order to fulfill my desire.
I will not let you run away.
and I can freely control ice.
Tsukune, we were destined to meet.
Because we are both loners, fate brought us together.
We will definitely understand each other.
We will warm our cold hearts.
but as long as your body is frozen, there is nowhere you can go.
When that happens, you will be all mine.
By pure luck, I was able to save Moka in the nick of time.
But thanks to that, the cake mixed with love potion that Tsukune was supposed to eat was completely wasted!
Those who hinder the true love between Tsukune and me, should just all disappear!
Especially you, Akashiya Moka, you are the only one I cannot...
This is going to far, Shirayuki-san.
If it is you, you should understand how it feels to be lonely, just like me.
Do not tell me... you are rejecting my feelings?
Be careful on your way back.
What are we going to do next?
Geez... students these days develop too quickly...
Hey, is there someone still around?
The long awaited cake got all mushy!
Even though the atmosphere became miserable,
You sound like an old man.
There seems to be a commotion outside.
Ah, everyone, you were all still here?
He was found quickly, so his life is not in danger, but...
B-But is there any proof that Shirayuki-san did it?
When we found him, Kotsubo-sensei himself said she did it.
She is an infamous problem child in the first place.
We should expel her as soon as possible.
The entire faculty is looking for her right now,
And of course, she is getting expelled as soon as she is found.
Besides that, why did Shirayuki-san do such a thing to Kotsubo-sensei who is unrelated to this...
She must have been throwing tantrums after being rejected by Tsukune-san.
With that kind of personality, it is definitely possible.
If I did not reject her so harshly...
You do not have to worry about such things.
Shirayuki-san's just getting what she deserves.
I will search for Shirayuki-san too!
I could not tell Shirayuki-san something that I wanted to tell her.
What is with him, getting so worked up...
Do not look at me like that!
I even brought some gutsy scoop photographs.
It is still not too late,
so come apologize with me, all right?
You only did it in the spur of the moment, right?
If you repent, I do not think they will expel you.
I thought only you would be able to understand me...
Shirayuki-san actually did not do anything wrong!
Kotsubo-sensei tried to do something despicable to Shirayuki-san while she was depressed!
That is why Shirayuki-san protected herself...
So that is what it was...
I did not believe in you, Shirayuki-san...
Tsukune did not understand me either...
Everyone should just get buried under pure white ice!
I will pull you up right now!
Someone like me will inevitably live alone...
I have something I did not get to tell you yet, Shirayuki-san!
Something you did not tell me?
But that is because I made precious friends!
If you died, there is no way you could be friends with me anymore!
It is just a collusive relationship.
True friendship would be to die together.
I cannot even control them anymore!
Once the rosary on her chest is removed,
The vampire blood within Moka will awaken.
Do you want to die too?
The only ones that will disappear...
They were created from supernatural energy.
That is why they got dispelled by an even stronger force.
Thank you for explaining it in simple terms!
I am not going to thank you...
If you wanted to die, why not try to fulfill something in your life first?
More like, your kick almost killed me...
This week's winner- no, even if there is not one, took only 86 seconds.
However, thanks to everyone, Shirayuki-san will not be expelled!
Eh, w-why is it so cold suddenly!
Even though you are exaggerating, I have decided to completely make myself over.
I thought I would start from my hairstyle first...
you actually managed to take those photographs!
thanks to those photographs, the accusations against Shirayuki-san were cleared...
I am always looking around the school for scoops, that is why!
I have to maintain the reputation of Newspaper Club Chairman, do not I?
So that is your true intention!
Speaking of which, if you helped out while taking photographs, would not the problem be solved?!
But is not this great, Tsukune?
Yep, I got saved by Moka-san yet again...
Somehow, I feel thirsty now that I am relieved...
Next week, Mathematics and a Vampire,
